titles.title: Social Security Investment Certification Act of 1993

To amend title II of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of the Treasury to issue to the trust funds under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program certificates evidencing obligations of the United States held by such trust funds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Social Security Investment Certification Act of 1993 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of the Treasury to issue to the trust funds supporting the OASDI program certificates evidencing obligations of the United States held by such funds. Provides for the treatment of outstanding obligations.
